HomePage.title: The website is under development, see you soon ;)
HomePage.heroDescription: At Amal Al Khair Holding Group, we provide accurate financial reports and specialized consulting services to support your business growth with confidence and transparency.
HomePage.aboutDescription: Amal Al Khair Holding Group is a leading Saudi group committed to excellence and innovation in the dates, poultry, and feed sectors. We believe that transparency and quality are the foundation of our success, and we strive to build long-term partnerships that create sustainable value for our community and clients.
HomePage.datesCompanyDesc: Production and export of the finest Saudi dates to local and global markets.
HomePage.poultryCompanyDesc: Leading in the production of fresh poultry with world-class quality standards.
HomePage.feedCompanyDesc: Providing high-quality feed to support the livestock sector.
HomePage.investmentCompanyDesc: Diverse investments supporting sustainable economic development.

datesCompany.title: Amal Al Khair Dates Company
datesCompany.description: One of the first approved projects in the Al Baha region of the Kingdom, using the finest varieties, and the product has been exported to many countries. 100% organic.

fishCompany.title: Amal Al Khair Fish Company
fishCompany.description: One of the first approved projects in the Al Baha region of the Kingdom, using the finest varieties, and the product has been exported to many countries. 100% organic.

feedCompany.title: Amal Al Khair Feed Company
feedCompany.description: One of the first approved projects in the Al Baha region of the Kingdom, using the finest varieties, and the product has been exported to many countries. 100% organic.

poultryCompany.title: Amal Al Khair Poultry Company
poultryCompany.description: One of the first approved projects in the Al Baha region of the Kingdom, using the finest varieties, and the product has been exported to many countries. 100% organic.

Products.title: Our Featured Products
Products.subtitle: Discover our most popular and high-quality products that have earned the trust of customers worldwide

featured1.title: Premium Ajwa Dates
featured1.description: Our signature Ajwa dates from Madinah, known for their exceptional taste and nutritional benefits. Perfect for export and local markets.

featured2.title: Fresh Tilapia Fish
featured2.description: Premium tilapia fish raised in our state-of-the-art aquaculture facilities, ensuring the highest quality and freshness for our customers.

featured3.title: Premium Poultry Feed
featured3.description: Nutritionally balanced feed formulated specifically for optimal growth and health of broiler chickens and laying hens.

featured4.title: Fresh Farm poultry
featured4.description: Grade A fresh poultry from our free-range chickens, produced under strict quality control and food safety standards.

storeOpening.title: Amal Al Khair Dates Store Opening
storeOpening.description: Amal Al Khair launches its first online store featuring all its products and offers payment services via credit cards, Mada cards, or cash on delivery, as well as many other services...

Newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
Newsletter.description: Get the latest news and updates from Amal Al Khair Holding Group

Presidents.title: Words of Presidents
Presidents.subtitle: Words of Board Presidents
Presidents.description: We present to you the words of current and former board presidents, which reflect our vision and journey in serving the community

currentPresident.title: Current Board President
currentPresident.message: "We at Amal Al-Khair Group believe in the importance of social responsibility and always strive to provide the best services to the community through our diverse projects in various sectors."

formerPresident.title: Former Board President
formerPresident.message: "It has been a wonderful journey in developing Amal Al-Khair Group and expanding the scope of our work to serve the community better."

foundingPresident.title: Founding Board President
foundingPresident.message: "Our dream was to create a strong commercial group that serves the community and develops the local economy, and today we are proud of what we have achieved."

Certifications.title: Certifications & Awards
Certifications.subtitle: Quality Certificates and Awards
Certifications.description: We are proud to have received many certificates and awards that reflect our commitment to quality and excellence in all our work

iso9001.title: ISO 9001:2015
iso9001.description: International quality management system certificate that confirms our commitment to global quality standards in all our operations

haccp.title: HACCP
haccp.description: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points system to ensure food safety in all our products

bestCompany.title: Best Company
bestCompany.description: Best company award in the agricultural and food sector for 2023 from the Ministry of Commerce and Industry

iso14001.title: ISO 14001
iso14001.description: Environmental management system certificate that confirms our commitment to environmental protection and sustainable development

foodSafety.title: Food Safety Award
foodSafety.description: Excellence award in food safety from the Saudi Food and Drug Authority for 2023

innovation.title: Innovation Award
innovation.description: Technical innovation award in the agricultural sector from the Ministry of Environment, Water and Agriculture
